column4: Hi, I did a fresh install of 11.04, I notice that videos (on vlc) often gets stuck on frames, the audio moves smoothly, just the video jitters often
have you tried other video players?
some players respond differently for different filetypes
hmmm but can't I fix vlc ?
maybe, maybe not.. i don't know what the problem is
totem seems to be doing better
mplayer has always worked for me
i use that for most files, simply because totem won't work for some
and i plain don't like vlc
why? i've been using vlc for a very long long time
installing mplayer, haven't used it so much
on windows i always used media player classic. i guess just because vlc has never worked as well, i don't consider it to be that great
vlc has actually always worked well for me
although the new system i've bought has been giving me some troubles with respect to the graphics card drivers (nvidia), so somehow I feel that is responsible
hm. can't help with much of the technical problems. with stuff like this if i find an alternative is working fine, i simply use that
